DOC.brief_title: RETRIeVE : ReversE TranscRiptase Inhibitor hiV Practice
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study involve retrospective review HIV-1 positive patient record begin treatment non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NNRTI ) subsequently fail . Patients virologically fail previous NNRTI treatment , resistance 1 drug NNRTI class examine . Such patient attend clinic every 3-6 month routine medical care . The data source variable collect patient 's electronic medical record . This database locate Holdsworth House Medical Practice ( HHMP ) , Sydney .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Documented HIV infection 2 . Attended Holdsworth House Medical Practice 19992009 . 3 . Chosen ART regime include NNRTI N/A
